original_text: Then the children of Ammon were gathered together, and encamped in Gilead. And the children of Israel assembled themselves together, and encamped in Mizpeh.
korean_text: 그 때에 암몬 자손이 모여서 길르앗에 진을 쳤으므로 이스라엘 자손도 모여서 미스바에 진을 치고

sentences.original_text: Then the children of Ammon were gathered together
And the children of Israel assembled themselves together
